resources.string: The Sistine Plaza Hotel has a health spa and wellness offers accommodation with free WiFi in Itagui. The hotel has a solarium, fitness center and restaurant. The park El Poblado is 3.4 km.

Hotel Mockingbird is in Itagui and offers free WiFi in all areas. In the morning a complimentary breakfast is served. Rooms at Hotel Mockingbird feature a minibar, flat-screen TV with cable channels and a fan.

The Hotel San Fernando Plaza offers luxurious accommodation with a heated outdoor pool, spa and fitness center in Medellin, in the financial and commercial district of El Poblado. It also houses a bar and a restaurant.

Hours: Tuesday - Sunday: 9:00 am to 5:00 P.M. 5.000 adults and 3,000 shorter than 1.20 MT, How to get there? Station integrated 0421- San Antonio de Prado, 5422 Itagüi Road - San Francisco, Services: Wave pool, Pool School, Childrens pool, water slides, Turkish. Free cloakroom, cafe and restaurant.
city stadium Itagui, Colombia used for football, rugby and athletics. The stadium was opened in 1994 and can accommodate 12,000 spectators.

are you excited by the art and the culture?
all this and much more awaits you in the magnificent city of Itagui.

The projected at 30 June 2012 for the municipality of Itagui, population is 258,520 inhabitants, making it the third largest conurbation of The Metropolitan Area of ​​the Aburrá Valley for a total of 3.312.165 people. The municipality has a population density of about 13,545 inhabitants per square kilometer. 47.2% of the population are men and 52.8% women. The city has an illiteracy rate of 4.9% in the population over 5 years old. Public services have a high cover, since a 98.9% of homes have electricity service, while 97.5% have water service and 94.7% of telephone communication. According to figures from the Government of Antioquia based on survey Quality of Life 2004 socioeconomic layer that predominates in Itagüi it is stratum 3 (medium-low) with 51.2% of the total housing in the municipality. Followed stratum 2 (low) with 41.7% and 1 (low-low) is 6.0%. Stratum 4 (medium) is only 1.1%.
